Text.Page:
It would be unwise to send you into the fray without knowing what you're capable of.

So demonstrateâ€”show me what you've got.

The {@LinkCreature:4#2011#voracious fangspawns} should prove a worthy test. Let's see you bring me their hearts.

If you intended to demonstrate the concept of "ease," then you succeeded, .

Most soldiers who arrive here find the fangspawns more of a challenge.
If you think you're too good for a simple assessment, then contemplate this: your arrogance is part of the assessment!
